special_containment_procedures: SCP-049 is to be contained in a standard secure humanoid containment cell at Site-19. Direct contact is strictly forbidden without approval.
description: SCP-049 appears to be a humanoid entity in the style of a medieval plague doctor. While it speaks several languages fluently, it tends to converse in English or Medieval French. SCP-049 is capable of performing complex surgical procedures without conventional equipment, often resulting in the creation of SCP-049-2 instances.
notes: Displays hostile behavior when interrupted in its 'work'.
